Package org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.frontend.authentication

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MySQLAuthenticator, OpenGaussAuthenticator, PostgreSQLAuthenticator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLClearPasswordAuthenticator, MySQLNativePasswordAuthenticator, OpenGaussMD5PasswordAuthenticator, OpenGaussSCRAMSha256PasswordAuthenticator, PostgreSQLMD5PasswordAuthenticator, PostgreSQLPasswordAuthenticator

    Authenticator.
